# British Soap Award for Best British Soap

| holder      = EastEnders (2025)
| most_awards = EastEnders (21)
}}
The British Soap Award for Best British Soap is an award presented annually by The British Soap Awards. The award is voted for by the public. EastEnders is the most awarded soap in the category, with thirteen wins. The award is currently held by EastEnders.
